short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find LinkedIn jobs from Dutch companies authorized to sponsor Kennismigrant visas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Features
üîç Automatically scans LinkedIn job listings
‚ú® Highlights jobs from recognized sponsors
üîÑ Maintains an up-to-date database
üè¢ Shows company sponsorship status in real-time
üì± Easy-to-use popup interface
üåê Detects English language job title

## Installation
1. Click "Add to Chrome"
2. The extension will automatically activate when you visit LinkedIn

## How to Use
1. Browse LinkedIn jobs as normal
2. Click the extension icon to see:
   - List of jobs on the current page
   - Sponsor status for each company
3. Click any job in the extension popup to navigate directly to it
4. Jobs posted by recognized sponsors are highlighted in green

### Data Collection and Usage
KMatch is committed to protecting your privacy. This extension:
- Does **not** collect any personal information
- Does **not** track your browsing history
- Does **not** store any user data
- Does **not** transmit any information to external servers
- Only reads and processes information on LinkedIn job pages
- Only operates within the LinkedIn.com domain
- Uses a local database of recognized sponsors
